headline.main: Senator Durbin Says Key Vote on Fast-Track Bill in Doubt
headline.print_headline: Senator Durbin Says Key Vote on Fast-Track Bill in Doubt

docs.snippet: The second-ranking Democrat in the U.S. Senate on Monday raised doubts that there was enough support among Democrats to propel controversial trade legislation over a procedural hurdle on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The second-ranking Democrat in the U.S. Senate on Monday raised doubts that there was enough support among Democrats to propel controversial trade legislation over a procedural hurdle on Tuesday.

headline.main: Man Charged in Airman's Death Near Missouri Air Force Base
headline.print_headline: Man Charged in Airman's Death Near Missouri Air Force Base

headline.main: Tom Hanks Returns as Symbologist Robert Langdon in 'Inferno'
headline.print_headline: Tom Hanks Returns as Symbologist Robert Langdon in 'Inferno'

docs.snippet: Tom Hanks reprises the role of Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon in the film version of Dan Brown's thriller "Inferno," unlocking more mysterious codes as the world-famous character he describes as "the smartest guy in the room"....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Hanks reprises the role of Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon in the film version of Dan Brown's thriller "Inferno," unlocking more mysterious codes as the world-famous character he describes as "the smartest guy in the room".

headline.main: Pennsylvania Woman Accused of Dropping Toddler Into River Faces Murder Charges
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Woman Accused of Dropping Toddler Into River Faces Murder Charges

docs.snippet: A young mother accused of dropping her toddler into eastern Pennsylvania's Lehigh River before jumping in herself was charged on Monday with criminal homicide after the boy died of his injuries....
docs.lead_paragraph: A young mother accused of dropping her toddler into eastern Pennsylvania's Lehigh River before jumping in herself was charged on Monday with criminal homicide after the boy died of his injuries.

headline.main: Castleton Joins Oil Trade Titans With Morgan Stanley Deal
headline.print_headline: Castleton Joins Oil Trade Titans With Morgan Stanley Deal

docs.snippet: Castleton Commodities International will buy Morgan Stanley's physical oil business, vaulting the Connecticut-based merchant into the big leagues of global crude and fuel traders....
docs.lead_paragraph: Castleton Commodities International will buy Morgan Stanley's physical oil business, vaulting the Connecticut-based merchant into the big leagues of global crude and fuel traders.

headline.main: Colombia Army Raids Illegal Mines Funding FARC Rebels
headline.print_headline: Colombia Army Raids Illegal Mines Funding FARC Rebels

docs.snippet: Colombia's armed forces raided 63 illegal mines operated by leftist FARC guerrillas on Monday, blowing up machinery and arresting dozens, in an operation the defense minister said will deprive FARC of $9 million a month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's armed forces raided 63 illegal mines operated by leftist FARC guerrillas on Monday, blowing up machinery and arresting dozens, in an operation the defense minister said will deprive FARC of $9 million a month.

headline.main: Detroit Delays Bond Sale Related to Bankruptcy Exit
headline.print_headline: Detroit Delays Bond Sale Related to Bankruptcy Exit

docs.snippet: Detroit's public sale of $275 million of bonds that financed the city's exit from bankruptcy has been delayed but should take place no later than early August, a city official said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Detroit's public sale of $275 million of bonds that financed the city's exit from bankruptcy has been delayed but should take place no later than early August, a city official said on Monday.

headline.main: To Market, to Market with Rob Pruitt

docs.snippet: The artist talks about his inspirations, in time for a career-spanning retrospective at the Brant Foundation....
